dublin_core.dcvalue: Data Collection Team Communication Better Decision Making DataWinners is the first completely integrated mobile data collection and communication service that uses the equipment you already have Transform paper forms into digital questionnaires Send group text messages and reminders Submit data via text messages anywhere from any phone On smartphones and tablets use our advanced questionnaires with skip logic repeating questions calculations and more DataWinners is developed by Human Network International HNI in collaboration with an international partnership of private sector companies academic institutions and non governmental organizations
